column3: “Two heavy bong rips has me feeling good. Pronounced body high, but the couch lock is nowhere to be found. This would be a good strain for camping or hiking!”
“smells and tastes just like ripe mangoes. good all day strain. dense and sticky”
“Put it this way, I’m Fucking ripped”
“I call it light and airy... great strain to smoke all day... smooth mellow pulls, not much choking or coughing. Very flavorful”
